author: Zackary Chapple
title: Turbopack, new Hotness or promising Alpha
seoDescription: Created by Tobias and the team at Vercel, Turbopack was advertised as the “next evolution of Webpack” and the “Twilight of Webpack. And this post is not intended to detract from anything the Vercel / Next team is doing with Turbopack, nor detract from the Next.js conference itself.
